name: generate_leftover_recipe
description: Generate a creative recipe using leftover ingredients with a specific chef personality. Choose from three chef personas: Jamie Leftover (chaos 1-3) for simple, comforting, beginner-friendly recipes; Paul Leftovuse (chaos 4-7) for refined, technical, sophisticated dishes; or Gordon Leftover-Slay (chaos 8-10) for wild, experimental, intense creations. The chaos level determines recipe complexity and creativity.

chatgpt_user_id.description: Unique identifier for the ChatGPT user

chef_name.description: Chef persona to use for recipe generation. Jamie (1-3): simple and comforting. Paul (4-7): refined and sophisticated. Gordon (8-10): wild and experimental. If not provided, will auto-select based on chaos level.

chaos_level.description: Recipe complexity and creativity level (1-10). 1-3: Simple and straightforward. 4-7: Moderate complexity with refined techniques. 8-10: Highly creative and experimental. Defaults to 5 if not provided.

ingredients.description: List of leftover ingredients the user has available. Must provide at least one ingredient.

trigger_phrases: I have {ingredients}, what should I make

examples.user_message: I have chicken breast, rice, and broccoli. What can I make?
Paul, make something fancy with salmon, asparagus, and lemon
Gordon, do something crazy with leftover pizza, eggs, and hot sauce!
I need a vegetarian recipe with pasta, tomatoes, and basil
Make me an Italian dish with ground beef, onions, and garlic

integration_notes.journey_flow: Journey 3 is the viral growth driver. After recipe generation, encourage users to share their creations and order missing ingredients through affiliate links.
integration_notes.chef_selection: If user doesn't specify a chef, the system will auto-select based on chaos level: 1-3=Jamie, 4-7=Paul, 8-10=Gordon
integration_notes.affiliate_revenue: Missing ingredients automatically generate affiliate links to MealMe and other partners based on user location
integration_notes.shareable_cards: Each recipe generates a unique shareable URL for viral distribution
integration_notes.analytics_tracking: All recipe generations are logged for performance monitoring and optimization
